p: We placed 7 g of emulgel in a graduated tube for a centrifugation test carried out at 25 Â°C using a Labofuge 200 Centrifuge (Thermo Scientific, Waltham, MA, USA). The test was performed at 4000 and 5300 rpm for 30 and 15 min, respectively. The phase separation and other instability phenomena were evaluated for macroscopic evidences.
